ATMProxy - Class in cscie160.hw6
ATM Client-side proxy class that manages the connection to the server and forwards the client's requests to the server by writing the text of requests to the stream on top of the sockect established at creation time when the constructor is called.
ATMProxy(String, int) - Constructor for class cscie160.hw6.ATMProxy
Default ATMProxy constructor initiates Socket and stream objects
